title: Radiation-resistant E. coli evolved in the lab give view into DNA repair

title_detail.value: Radiation-resistant E. coli evolved in the lab give view into DNA repair

summary: Scientists are blasting E. coli bacteria with ionizing radiation once a week to watch evolution happen in real time as the bacteria become radiation resistant.

summary_detail.value: Scientists are blasting E. coli bacteria with ionizing radiation once a week to watch evolution happen in real time as the bacteria become radiation resistant.
